get.description: Gets detailed information for a specified extension.

parameters.name: belongsTo
parameters.description: Validates that a token has the specified tenant in scope, for performance. Valid tokens are in the `/tokens/{tokenId}` path. An itemNotFound (`404`) fault is returned for a token that is not valid.

get.description: Validates a token and confirms that it belongs to a specified tenant.

head.description: Validates a token and confirms that it belongs to a specified tenant, for performance.

get.description: Lists the endpoints associated with a specified token.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The ID of the user for which you want to perform the request.

get.description: Gets detailed information about a specified user by user name.
Gets detailed information about a specified user by user ID.
Lists global roles for a specified user. Excludes tenant roles.

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: A valid authentication token for an administrative user.

parameters.name: marker
parameters.description: The ID of the last item in the previous list.

get.description: Gets detailed information about a specified tenant by name.

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: A valid authentication token for an administrative user.

get.description: Gets detailed information about a specified tenant by ID.

parameters.name: X-Auth-Token
parameters.description: A valid authentication token for an administrative user.

get.description: Lists roles for a specified user on a specified tenant. Excludes global roles.
